channel.title: What do you guys think about Rift?
channel.description:
I want to know your opinions.
I made account, started a trial and then downloaded the client for 3 hours(They really should make it so you can play it while it's downloading like WoW), after it was ready I logged in, created a character, I liked how you could create a character that looks exactly like you, after creating a character and skipping the cinematic, I played a while and thought that the characters look pretty..gayish and not like they should look in a fantasy game, and the starting area(maybe the whole world?) was too grim for my liking. I never got out of the starting area, since the game was damn boring, quests and all were all the same, xp from quests were also horrible(For example, you got a quest where you have to kill 5 of some creatures which give 100xp each returning the quest will give about 200xp?)...
I didn't like it at all.

item.title: What do you guys think about Rift?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickk Patrickk
item.description:
@Patrickk wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:13, topic:398518”]Even WoW is shit now…wrath of the lich king ruined dungeon parties. Before you needed to carefully mark/plan/cc every mob even in a shitty dungeon…now you can just leeroy your way through shit.

…anyone know of a well populated WoW TBC Priv server? :D[/quote]

Could try this; http://www.wow-one.com/
Haven’t played either, but I’ve heard good things about the Vanilla one.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you guys think about Rift?

item.title: What do you guys think about Rift?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:13, topic:398518”]Even WoW is shit now…wrath of the lich king ruined dungeon parties. Before you needed to carefully mark/plan/cc every mob even in a shitty dungeon…now you can just leeroy your way through shit.

…anyone know of a well populated WoW TBC Priv server? :D[/quote]
I never bought WOLK, I still have WoW BC. I never got to experience that, but it’s good as it is aswell. It’s actually more addictive now.
Last christmas I decided to subscribe to see what changes the Catalysm did and I played whole month, before I usually quit after 2 weeks because it got boring or something. and I’ve played so far, but I will stop now because its summer

Read full topic
item.source: What do you guys think about Rift?

item.description:

That’s not why I said you’re dumb, but because

All Day:

Never gonna be a MMORPG that is as good as WoW

then…

[quote="-Nothing, post:9, topic:398518"][quote author=All Day link=topic=495652.msg3624654#msg3624654 date=1307737484]
Never gonna be a MMORPG that is as good as WoW, but they tried.

/thread
[/quote]
Not even close to what WoW is, it’s a worse version of it.[/quote]

item.title: What do you guys think about Rift?

item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I want to know your opinions.

I made account, started a trial and then downloaded the client for 3 hours(They really should make it so you can play it while it’s downloading like WoW), after it was ready I logged in, created a character, I liked how you could create a character that looks exactly like you, after creating a character and skipping the cinematic, I played a while and thought that the characters look pretty…gayish and not like they should look in a fantasy game, and the starting area(maybe the whole world?) was too grim for my liking. I never got out of the starting area, since the game was damn boring, quests and all were all the same, xp from quests were also horrible(For example, you got a quest where you have to kill 5 of some creatures which give 100xp each returning the quest will give about 200xp?)…

I didn’t like it at all.
